headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Applied Materials (AMAT) After A 53% One Year Run?
summary: Investors may be wondering if Applied Materials, at a last close of US$268.87, is still a reasonable entry point or if the price already reflects the story they are buying into today. The stock has returned 2.2% over the last 7 days and 0.3% over the last 30 days, while the 1-year return sits at 53.0% and the 3-year and 5-year returns are 159.4% and 186.6% respectively. Recent coverage around chip equipment makers has focused on how investor expectations are shifting with sector-wide capital...
